description: Izuma Kaname is a Senior at St. Ishiyama High School, and a member of the Rokkisei. He is the leader of the six knights, Mikki`s teacher, the master of the Izuma dojo and the student council president. He is the descendant of a demon who escaped to the human world and he was taken up by Saint Ishiyama`s headmaster upon losing his place in society for showing his powers in a previous school.
name: Izuma Kaname
